item.title: Conferences in Economics and Finance
item.description:
I will use this page to collect information about conferences in Economics and Finance.

If you know about public conferences or meetings that are missing from this list, please either contact me or edit the table on Github!

Note that conferences are ordered by deadline and not by conference date.

January

Conference Organizer Field Deadline Target Date
Annual Congress of the Swiss Society of Economics and Statistics SSES All January 31 All 23/06/21

item.title: My Color Palette
item.description:
Ok, this is a fun post. I am choosing… my color palette!

I have decided to unify all the color palettes I have on my website, slides, graphs, etc… into a unique universal color palette.

Main Color

First of all, I have to choose my main color.


Here are some shades of it.


Related Palettes

Now I will build a couple of colors palettes based on it.

The first one, is red oriented.


Second one, is green oriented.


Color Sequence

Now I need a high contrast scheme for graphs. I add one color at the time to check that contrast is always maximized.


A milder version of the same palette is:

Resources

  • To generate the palette: https://learnui.design/tools/data-color-picker.html
  • To generate the palette (2): https://mycolor.space/
  • To get different shades of the same color: https://www.tutorialrepublic.com
  • To build the palette: https://htmlcolorcodes.com/
  • To test the palette: http://colormind.io/bootstrap/
  • To embed the palette in a HTML page: https://coolors.co/

item.title: Online Seminars in Economics and Finance
item.description:

If you know about public seminars that are missing from this list, please either contact me or edit the table on Github!
